alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Macon; Peach; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:24AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Macon, central Peach, southwestern Crawford and Taylor Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 923 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Butler, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fort Valley, Butler, Marshallville, Reynolds, Saint Louis, Nakomis, Garden Valley, Hicks, Potterville, Lee Pope, Horns, Winchester, Fickling Mill and Miami Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
